CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Graduate School relative to Zenith Institute of Technology?
SRP.A: Borealis Graduate School is {below} Zenith Institute of Technology in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Graduate School relative to Meridian Academy?
SRP.A: Borealis Graduate School is {above} Meridian Academy in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Arcane University relative to Zenith Institute of Technology?
SRP.A: Arcane University is {above} Zenith Institute of Technology in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Academy}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate is in {1970}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Institute of Technology's maximum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Institute of Technology's maximum Graduation Rate is in {1973}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1991, did the total Graduation Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 1995?
NC.A: The change in total graduation rate between 1985 and 1991 was {larger} than between 1992 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1983, did the total Graduation Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1995?
NC.A: The change in total graduation rate between 1973 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1981, did the total Graduation Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total graduation rate between 1978 and 1981 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Graduation Rate in 1974 higher or lower than in 1975?
NC.A: The total graduation rate in 1974 was {higher} than in 1975.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Zenith Institute of Technology} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Arcane University and Meridian Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Arcane University and Meridian Academy first exchanged leading positions in {1971}.
